item.title: Photo Roll 06 - Scenes From The Studio - October 2023
item.description: September 30, 2023 Whole bunch of lettering bubbles and a lit, bubbling hookah. Not the worst way to start a work session. Watching Kiko roll through Stonekeep and reading through the Our Lady Maven script. Pencils down on the first panel on page 4. Some early drafts for potential cover art for an upcoming project. October 15, 2023 Initial pencils down on the Jazzy Fuckin' Holidays poster for Datafruits. A whole bunch of pieces in progress on the rack.
